sense.gloss: home country, one's own country, country of origin
suzerain country (from the perspective of the vassal state), colonizing country

sdata.j: そのスパイは↑本国↑↓|ほんごく|↓へ↑帰↑↓かえ↓るとすぐに↑他国↑↓たこく↓へ↑行↑↓い↓くように↑言↑↓い↓われた。
sdata.e: No sooner had the spy returned home than he was told to go to another country.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓は↑本国↑↓|ほんごく|↓では↑人気↑↓にんき↓がなかった。
sdata.e: His music was not popular at home.
